title: Roast rump of beef, couscous, and red wine sauce
description: Two cuts of beef, one marinated in spices and the other braised slowly in a red wine sauce.
ingredients: 300-400g/10-14oz beef rump, trimmed of any fat or sinew
1-1.5 litres/1¾-2½ pints beef stock (enough to cover the meat)
small bunch fresh coriander, chopped, plus extra to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
